allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: prevent infinite loading on logout and session expiry

- Add 3s timeout to getSession\(\) in initAuth to prevent hanging
- Set loading=false immediately after setting user \(non-blocking\)
- Run checkUserStatus in background without blocking UI
- Remove blocking getSession\(\) call from SIGNED_OUT handler
- Add try-catch-finally to auth state change handlers
- Ensure loading is always set to false in all code paths
- signOut now clears state immediately and reloads page

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Deploy: Add subscription management, payment processing, admin features, and comprehensive UI updates

- Implement subscription payment processing with PortOne integration
- Add subscription upgrade/downgrade functionality
- Implement weekly routine planning system
- Add admin activity feed and support system
- Update components and pages with latest features
- Add database migrations for subscription and routine management
- Enhance API endpoints for user interactions and admin operations
- Add VideoPreload context and FeedbackCenter page
- Improve video player and feed functionality

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
